item.title: GTI MK7 Build
item.description: Performance Upgrades APR Engine (ECU) Tune Stage 1 APR Transmission (TCU) Tune Stage 1 NGK Performance Spark Plugs Racingline R600 Closed Intake Racingline Turbo inlet pipe & hoses APR Turbo muffler delete Integrated Engineering Performance Intercooler APR Engine (ECU) Tune Stage 1 The easiest way to get more power. If I could only do one mod, this would be it. The APR Engine tune takes your car from 220HP to 316HP (!

item.title: About
item.description: I am Jitachi, a product designer made of curiosity, stubbornness, and a hint of foolishness, per Professor Utonium's words. Currently Founding Designer at Railway PaaS Platform 2019-2021 Since 2021, I've been poured my heart and soul into Railway—a modern software deployment and observability platform—as the founding designer. Before Sr Product Designer at Rainforest Automated Software QA 2019-2021 Founding Designer at Kong Enterprise-grade API Tooling 2019-2021 Product Designer at Corpfolder Mexico-specific Accountability Software 2019-2021 Interaction Designer at Freshout RIP.
